hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Which university are you at? my-canada-store.com reviews SPF means Sun Protection Factor. An SPF of 50 will protect skin 50 times longer than it would take skin to burn without any protection. So, if skin starts to redden after 20 minutes, SPF 50 should be effective for the entire day. However, other factors such as water contact and perspiration will cause it to wear off, so Blomstedt recommends reapplying every two to three hours while outside and every hour while swimming.
